publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2128.1 Murdo Fraser: Scottish Banknotes—As an amendment to motion (S3M-2128) in the name of Gil Paterson, leave out from "calls on" to end and insert "bemoans the apparent SNP hypocrisy on this issue, given that SNP policy is to replace the pound with the Euro, which move would permanently eliminate Scottish banknotes as Euro notes can only be issued by the European Central Bank." Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S3M-2128.1 Murdo Fraser: Scottish Banknotes—As an amendment to motion (S3M-2128) in the name of Gil Paterson, leave out from "calls on" to end and insert "bemoans the apparent SNP hypocrisy on this issue, given that SNP policy is to replace the pound with the Euro, which move would permanently eliminate Scottish banknotes as Euro notes can only be issued by the European Central Bank."
